overview: Dylan and Matthew, two idealistic troublemakers, refuse to live by society's rules. They squat foreclosed homes, steal to survive, and romanticize crime. As the consequences of their lifestyle start to manifest, Matthew wonders if this life they've carved for themselves has finally run its course. But Dylan refuses to give it all up, putting the two at a crossroads, and testing their once unbreakable bond.
title: Summerholidays
